features: ✨【25000+ Classic Games & 12 Emulators】Experience a wide range of retro games, including arcade, competition, puzzle, maze, and more. Our retro game stick is compatible with MAME/GB/MD/PS/WSC/PCE, and more popular emulators

🎮【Plug and Play Video Games for TV】Connect our nostalgia stick to your TV with an HD port for a seamless gaming experience. Enjoy stunning 4K HD output and immerse yourself in the game on a large screen

🎮【Support TV/Projector/Monitor】Easily connect the retro wand game stick to your display device using the HD I/F. No complicated setup required - simply use your TV remote control to switch to the HD channel and access the game list screen

✨【Simple UI, Easy to Operate】Navigate through the intuitive UI and easily access key game functions such as saving and loading, favorites, and search. The Game stick lite 4k is also designed to be user-friendly for kids
🎮【2.4GHz Wireless Controller】Our retro gaming consoles stick comes with two wireless controllers featuring a 3D joystick and ergonomic design for precise and immersive gameplay

🎮【Small Size, Easy to Carry】The compact size of our retro stick makes it convenient to carry and perfect for gatherings with family and friends. It's like a time machine that takes you back to relive the joy of childhood

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rediscover the joy of gaming with our feature-packed Retro game console -- 4K Game Stick Lite. With its versatile game systems, extensive library, plug-and-play convenience, compatibility, and smooth gaming experience, it's the perfect choice for gamers of all levels. 25000+ nostalgia stick games12 EmulatorsSupports TVs/projectors/monitors with HD I/FSupport switching system languageSupport 2 Players2.4GHz wireless controllers

Plug and Play No complicated configuration required, just plug and play. 25000+ Retro Games Various game types such as competition, puzzle, arcade, and fighting will help you relive the fun of childhood! Portable Mini Size Mini size allows you to carry it anywhere. It’s a great choice for parties, team building!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for what it is, keep your expectations low
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a basic emulator you can hook up to your TV this is a pretty good option.There is the ability to add other ROMs by adding them to the microSD card but I haven't gone through the while list of games already that came loaded on it. Yes, there are probably thousands of games on it, but there's like 20 different versions of the exact same fighting game.Also, the game naming convention isn't the greatest, get ready to browse thousands of letters trying to decipher what game is stands for.The controllers are ok, they are super light and do not feel durable. There is a slight input lag as well. But what do you expect at this price point. Also, do not miss the tiny USB Bluetooth adapter for them in the box. Mine was hiding and I didn't realize it until I tried connecting the controllers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Retro Game Stick
reviews.reviewText: Ehhh its cool I guess but nothing special. It does come loaded with a bunch of games but really nothing that came out this century. Everything loaded on this device is over 25 years old. It can be fun but gets boring pretty quick. I will say, its pretty easy to setup and use and connects to the TV via HDMI. The retro "PS2 style" controllers require 2 AAA batteries. Does come with instructions but they are basically useless. Again, its a cool toy but not something I would pay money for personally.
